description: Indicates whether the specified access point currently has a policy that allows public access. For more information about public access through access points, see Managing Data Access with Amazon S3 access points in the Amazon S3 User Guide.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID for the account that owns the specified access point.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the access point whose policy status you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: PolicyStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the current policy status of the specified access point.
